Class FileController

java.lang.Object
com.ads.controllers.FileController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*", allowedHeaders="*") @RestController @RequestMapping("/ads") public class FileController extends Object
Control the timetable servixe and the service of file

      @PostMapping("/headers") public List<String> processFileToGetHeaders(@RequestPart("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      process a csv file to get the headers
      Parameters:
      file - - generic file to give the headers
      Returns:
      headers inside of file (excel or csv, json TBD)

    • processTimetable

      @PostMapping("/execute") public List<List<Timetable>> processTimetable(@RequestPart("classFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile classFile, @RequestPart("timetableFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile timetableFile, @ModelAttribute RequestDTO requestDTO)
      Submit form - receives a classroom file and timetable file and returns a new timetable json
      Parameters:
      classFile - - classroom file
      timetableFile - - timetable file
      requestDTO - - additional parameters as mappings, criteria and execution speed
      Returns:
      timetable json -> based on validations and criteria pass through initial request
